alert.note: Alert for Meriwether; Troup (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 06 at 7:48PM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Meriwether and southeastern Troup Counties through 815 PM EDT... At 748 PM EDT, a strong thunderstorm was near Stovall, or 10 miles southeast of LaGrange, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...40 to 50 mph wind, frequent cloud to ground lightning and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Heavy rain may cause temporary street flooding especially in poor drainage areas. Locations impacted include... Greenville, Warm Springs, Stovall, Raleigh, Mountville, Big Springs, Durand, Harris City, Odessadale and Smiths Crossroad. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. Motorists should slow down and be prepared for possible loss of control due to hydroplaning.
